properties.markdownProperty:
Get objects from classes (`get_objects_from_classes`) is a method from `TraceabilityMatrixHelper` class. It takes a string (classes separated by spaces) and return all the objects from the classes. The returned object are listed in a node-set. This node set has a specific format to make easier parsing from the XSLT template. `object_label` represents the object`s proteus code, if there is no `:Proteus-code` it uses the `:Proteus-name`.
``` <object id="object_id"> <label>object_label</label> </object> ```
